Stony Creek Prototypes

About Us

Thank you for visiting Stony Creek Prototypes! Our specialty has always been with custom painting and assembly of Class-One fallen flags, modern equipment, rolling stock and locomotives. We like to work with most shortlines & regionals, but love to work with freelance railroads. Check out our portfolio below and if questions feel free to contact me.

Get Started!
